ComicInfo.Summary: Backlash and Taboo track S'yrn to Chicago where the villain has crashed a celebrity gala in order to kill WildC.A.T.S leader, Jacob Marlowe. As Backlash is battling S'yrn, the Savage Dragon gets involved.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brett Booth,Jeff Mariotte,Sean Ruffner,Jeff Mariotte,Brett Booth,Sean Ruffner
